documents.document: Thank guys for your amazing support with all the RTs, #FF mentions and comments! Now it’s time for me to hit the gym. See you :)
“Life is the art of drawing without an eraser.” ~John William Gardner #GQ #life #quote
“Women will never be as successful as men because they have no wives to advise them.” ~Dick Van Dyke #GQ #quote
“No man ever steps in the same river twice, for it’s not the same river and he’s not the same man.” ~Heraclitus #GQ #life #quote
I think that’s it for the Friday Funnies #funnyquotes We shall now resume our regularly scheduled programming. Thanks for playing along :)
“Oh, so they have internet on computers now!” ~Homer J. Simpson #lol #quote
“Honolulu—it’s got everything: sand for the children, sun for the wife, sharks for the wife’s mother.” ~Ken Dodd #lol #quote
“Lisa, vampires are make-believe like elves, gremlins, and eskimos.” ~Homer J. Simpson #lol #quote
“That’s it! You people have stood in my way long enough. I’m going to clown college!” ~Homer J. Simpson #lol #quote
Stay tuned for the #GoogleWave invite, one going out this coming week :) Is it time for Friday Funnies yet?
Oh and, would you like a #GoogleWave invite?
The beautiful #FollowFriday All Stars ★ @just1heather ★ @Jenn_Chinn ★ @IloveTwilightBR ★ Thanks for being awesome! :)
I almost got you, didn’t I? :) You thought I had forgotten the #FollowFriday All Stars! Of course not, so here they come…
If I missed you, let me know and I will make it up to you :) Also big thanks for everyone who has listed me. Much appreciated!
… and last but not least #FF @quoteshash @Marketing_Viral @xanpearson @DrJohnB @rleseberg @brad0301 @aprodanoski Big thanks to all! :)

…or @oasischarlotte @MsEm1122 @ChadGuevara @Ebonieshia @haydeenyy @sharynread @gigiveganchic @quotesclub @TwittQuotes @health_club #FF :) …
…not forgetting @nuggetsmom31 (of course you made the cut:) @JaLaDesigns @CharityIdeas @ReeveFoundation @candelaria02 @carkrol #FF …
…and @inspiringtweet @kathiekeeler @PlanetSelf @abc4rebt @beckytweets @Timeisme @Stodsports @mushyola @maychch @brandonrofl @IsabelTrent :)…
…and obviously @MikeMoulton @pianofingerz @LorenaHeletea @richfrompana @Vincent_Ang @Traveling_Angel @stubbornone12 @INrLifePractice …
…and of course @dpbkmb @nmfourwheeler @ChangeJourney @KammieK @ruaalien2 @smileSzsOflyy @Alex_rg @penthor1111 @Hussle24Seven @wadecrptrng …
Beautiful thanks for RTs and mentions go out to @official92 @terrymslobodian @chrissymyers @milss @LarayDives @cricket27L @merhytes …
Wow, again you guys have RT’d me well over 100 times this past week. I really appreciate that! To show my appreciation, here comes #FF :)
@just1heather “Every true genius is bound to be naïve.” ~Friedrich Schiller :) #GQ #genius #quote
@just1heather Maybe you could talk little J into doing a little webinar for us as one of our Featured Thinkers? :)
“Doctor, if you’re gonna give me a shot, then it’s gonna cost you three suckers!” ~Little J @just1heather :)
“Obviously, there is little you can learn from doing nothing.” ~Zig Ziglar #GQ #life #quote
Ah, another fine Friday is here! #FollowFriday mentions soon to follow :)
“All change is not growth, as all movement is not forward” ~Ellen Glasgow #GQ #growth #quote
“Affirmation without discipline is the beginning of delusion.” ~Jim Rohn #GQ #discipline #quote
Thank you guys for all your beautiful RTs, comments, DMs and all. You rock! You will get special mentions tomorrow, that’s for sure :)
“!!!” ~The Angry Mime #lol #quote :)
“The secret of success is constancy to purpose.” ~Benjamin Disrael #GQ #success #quote
Oh man. My apologies for the unintended spam. Sorry.
“Perhaps the reward of the spirit who tries is—not the goal—but the exercise.” ~Edmund Vance Cooke #GQ #life #quote
“Success is getting what you want, happiness is wanting what you get.” ~Dale Carnegie #GQ #success #happiness #quote
“Failure is the condiment that gives success its flavor.” ~Truman Garcia Capote #GQ #success #quote
“Nothing is as powerful as an idea whose time has come.” ~Victor Hugo #GQ #ideas #quote
Oh, I’m back from a meeting and we’re past the 1K mark. Thank you beautiful people! @lcdpro gets the special 1K honors :)
…there’s nothing I’m afraid of, I’ll show you what I’m made of, show you all it’s my time now” ~Andrew Lloyd Webber, Diane Warren #lyrics
“It’s my time, it’s my time, my moment, I’m not gonna let go of it. My time, it’s my time, and I’ll stand proud… #lyrics #inspiration
“There’s a heart like mine, somewhere in this world, there’s a heart like mine, beating but left to burn” ~Bee Gees #lyrics #quote
“Don’t give up. Don’t lose hope. Don’t sell out.” ~Christopher Reeve #GQ #life #quote
“A hero is someone who understands the responsibility that comes with his freedom.” ~Bob Dylan #GQ #life #quote
Would you like a #Brizzly invite? I’m giving away one right about now. Let me know. PS. I haven’t forgotten about the #GoogleWave invite :)
“At first dreams seem impossible, then improbable, and eventually inevitable.” ~Christopher Reeve #GQ #dreams #quote
“The trouble with most people is that they think with their hopes or fears or wishes rather than with their minds.” ~Will Durant #quote
“We learn from experience that men never learn anything from experience.” ~George Bernard Shaw #GQ #life #quote
“Once you choose hope, anything’s possible.” ~Christopher Reeve #GQ #hope #quote Please RT
“Don’t wish it was easier—wish you were better.” ~Jim Rohn #GQ #mindset #success #quote
“You cannot make it as wandering generality. You must become a meaningful specific.” ~Zig Ziglar #zigziglar #success #quote
“You must submit to supreme suffering in order to discover the completion of joy.” ~John Calvin #GQ #perseverance #quote
“That which does not kill us makes us stronger.” ~Friedrich Wilhelm Nietzsche #endurance #quote
“If you conceive it, you can achieve it, that’s why, I believe in you, yes I do” ~Brand New Heavies #lyrics #quote #musicmonday
“You are the Universe, and there ain’t nothin’ you can't do” ~Brand New Heavies #lyrics #quote #musicmonday
... How ’bout how good it feels to finally forgive you, how ’bout grieving it all one at a time” ~Alanis Morissette #lyrics #musicmonday
“How ’bout me not blaming you for everything, how ’bout me enjoying the moment for once ...
“All I want is the truth now, just gimme some truth” ~John Lennon #lyrics #quote #musicmonday
“I wanna be the glass when you take a sip, at least I know I’ll get to touch your lips” ~Kurt Nilsen #lyrics #musicmonday
“I am the one and only, nobody I’d rather be” ~Chesney Hawkes / Nik Kershaw #lyrics #musicmonday #90s
“I was made to work. If you are equally industrious, you will be equally successful.” ~Johann Sebastian Bach #GQ #success #quote
Oh and, you have been unfollowed. If it was spam that got sent without your knowledge, let me know and you shall be reinstated. Cheers :)
Please stop spamming me with DMs about “cool ringtones” mine is pretty cool as it is, thanks for asking :)
“It is a shameful thing for the soul to faint while the body still perseveres.” ~Marcus Aurelius Antoninus Augustus #GQ #quote
“Seventy percent of success in life is showing up.” ~Woody Allen #GQ #life #success #quote
Thank’s for all the replies so far! How about you? Would you like a #GoogleWave invite? I have an idea I’ll run by you this coming week :)
Would you like a #GoogleWave invite?
“He who suffers much will come to know much.” ~Greek proverb #GQ #endurance #quote
“Know how sublime a thing it is to suffer and be strong.” ~Henry Wadsworth Longfellow #GQ #endurance #quote
“The true measure of a man is how he treats someone who can do him absolutely no good.” ~Ann Landers #GQ #greatness #quote
“Unless you’re willing to have a go, fail miserably, and have another go, success won’t happen.” ~Phillip Adams #GQ #success #quote
“Man is certainly stark raving mad. He cannot make a worm, yet he makes gods by the dozens.” ~Michel de Montaigne #GQ #quote
Took a while longer, decided to walk the proverbial extra mile (actually two)! Will be with you sortly @LiteraryNobody :)
“What a lovely surprise to finally discover how unlonely being alone can be.” ~Ellen Burstyn #GQ #quote
@kbthing2 My pleasure! Have an awesome day with your new hair ;)
@LiteraryNobody I’m off to the gym right now, but I’ll DM you when I get back. It’s not complicated to do it right :)
@kbthing2 Well done! :)
@LiteraryNobody Not in spite of them, but because of them. Seriously. You need proper food :)
@kbthing2 Hey Kathryn, thank you so much, you have a new avatar! :)
So, who does Festivus? :)
“A man cannot be said to succeed in this life who does not satisfy one friend.” ~Henry David Thoreau #GQ #friendship #quote
“The value of impermanence is to call attention to the permanent.” ~Stuart Davis #GQ #quote
“I never smile unless I mean it.” ~Donald ‘Donny’ Osmond :) #GQ #smile #quote
@abc4rebt And that is the perfect opportunity to show mercy and kindness. Right? :)
“Tolerance can lead to learning something.” ~Jakob Dylan #GQ #quote
“Appreciate me now, and avoid the rush” ~Ashleigh Brilliant #GQ #appreciation #quote
“Revolution begins with the self, in the self.” ~Toni Cade Bambara #GQ #quote
RT @Jim_Rohn_Quotes: “Either you run the day or the day runs you.” ~Jim Rohn #jimrohn #quote
@just1heather Hehe, cheers! Almost didn’t recognise you with all that ladybugness :D
“Violence is a tool of the ignorant.” ~Clerow ‘Flip’ Wilson #GQ #peace #quote
“I don’t have a lot of respect for talent. Talent is genetic. It’s what you do with it that counts.” ~Martin Ritt #GQ #talent #quote
“Just another manic Monday” ~Prince / The Bangles #lyrics #quote #musicmonday :)
“Modern music is as dangerous as cocaine.” ~Pietro Mascagni #GQ #music #quote #musicmonday :)
“The great aim of education is not knowledge, but action.” ~Herbert Spencer #GQ #action #quote
Great week, good workout, feeling W-E double hockey sticks! :D
RT @Jim_Rohn_Quotes: “How long should you try? Until.” ~Jim Rohn #jimrohn #quote
“Pay no attention to what the critics say. A statue has never been erected in honor of a critic.” ~Jean Sibelius #GQ #attitude #quote
Thank you all for an epic week! Life is good :)
Big #FollowFriday thanks to @just1heather @Jenn_Chinn @IloveTwilightBR @jennieMACAULAY @1txsage1957 :)
